Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.name: remoteScreenShareViewSize
Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.abstract: Screen share rendering view size has changed.

Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.name: receivingScreenShare(_:)
Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.abstract: True if the local party now is receiving screen share. Otherwise false.

Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.name: remoteSendingScreenShare(_:)
Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.abstract: True if the screen share now is receiving and joined. Otherwise false.

Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.name: sendingScreenShare(_:)
Classes/Call/MediaChangedEvent.html#/s:8.abstract: True if the screen share now is sending. Otherwise false.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: localLeft
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: The local party has left the call.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: localDecline
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: The local party has declined the call.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: localCancel
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: The local party has cancelled the call.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: remoteLeft
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: The remote party has left the call.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: remoteDecline
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: The remote party has declined the call.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: remoteCancel
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: The remote party has cancelled the call.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: otherConnected
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: One of the other phones of the authenticated user has answered the call.

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.name: otherDeclined
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html#/s:8S.abstract: One of the other phones of the authenticated user has declined the call.

Classes/Call/Direction.html#/s:8SparkSDK.name: incoming
Classes/Call/Direction.html#/s:8SparkSDK.abstract: The local party is a recipient of the call.

Classes/Call/Direction.html#/s:8SparkSDK.name: outgoing
Classes/Call/Direction.html#/s:8SparkSDK.abstract: The local party is an initiator of the call.

Classes/Call/Direction.html.name: Direction
Classes/Call/Direction.html.abstract: The enumeration of directions of a call

Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html.name: DisconnectReason
Classes/Call/DisconnectReason.html.abstract: The enumuaration of reasons for a call being disconnected.

Classes/Call/Capabilities.html.name: Capabilities

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC11on.name: onConnected
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC11on.abstract: Callback when remote participant(s) answered and this call is connected.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC14on.name: onDisconnected
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC14on.abstract: Callback when this call is disconnected (hangup, cancelled, get declined or other self device pickup the call).

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC02on.name: onCallMembershipChanged
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC02on.abstract: Callback when the memberships of this call have changed.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC14on.name: onMediaChanged

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC21on.name: onCapabilitiesChanged

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC24on.name: oniOSBroadcastingChanged
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC24on.abstract: Callback when the iOS broadcasting status of this call have changed.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC18se.name: sendingDTMFEnabled

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC18re.name: remoteSendingVideo
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC18re.abstract: True if the remote party of this call is sending video. Otherwise, false.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC18re.name: remoteSendingAudio
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC18re.abstract: True if the remote party of this call is sending audio. Otherwise, false.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC24re.name: remoteSendingScreenShare
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC24re.abstract: True if the remote party of this call is sending screen share. Otherwise, false.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC12se.name: sendingVideo
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC12se.abstract: True if the local party of this call is sending video. Otherwise, false.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC12se.name: sendingAudio
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC12se.abstract: True if this call is sending audio. Otherwise, false.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC18se.name: sendingScreenShare
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC18se.abstract: True if the local party of this call is sending screen share. Otherwise, false.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC14re.name: receivingAudio

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC20re.name: receivingScreenShare
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC20re.abstract: True if the local party of this call is receiving screen share. Otherwise, false.

Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC9isS.name: isSpeaker
Classes/Call.html#/s:8SparkSDK4CallC9isS.abstract: True if the loud speaker is selected as the audio output device for this call. Otherwise, false.
